extendedInfo.description: Dream Reminder is an UNIQUE Application.Every people see dreams, but forget it over time.This is our simple try by which you can remember your dreams, we hope that you will become endeavor to achieve it.This application is based on LAW OF ATTRACTIONS(Must Watch "SECRET" Movie). We do hope that your dreams will be true.This application is design and copyrights by Pioneer Web Systems,Ahmedabad,India.If you have any query or suggestion then email us on info@pioneerwebsystem.comYou can copy your dream by long click on Dream and after that you can edit it also.There is no need of internet connection.This application is developed by PioneerMobApps.com.If you have any query or suggestion then write us on info@pioneermobapps.comTAGS:achieve dreamlaw of attractiondreams rememberdream activatorpsychology tool

reviews.title: Red Rose
reviews.comment: What\'s wrong with this app? Full of errors! Doesn\'t upload photos and now doesn\'t aacept updating.  Had to uninstall it, and NOW CAN\'T REINSTALL IT. SUCKS!!
reviews.author: A Google User
